pr_title: Fix #5253 - Deck Options Corruption on Export

timeline.message:
Fix #5253 - Deck Options Corruption on Export

User complaint that exporting a deck reset the deck options to 1.

This also appears to have been the cause of a dynamic deck having
options, and therefore being corrupted. #5708

We fix this via an inefficient deep clone.

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid unnecessary constructors - the compiler will generate these for you
timeline.author: timrae

replies.bodyText: I feel a private constructor is more explicit.
replies.author: david-allison-1
